metadata.title: CVE-2019-11939 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: Golang Facebook Thrift servers would not error upon receiving messages declaring containers of sizes larger than the payload. As a result, malicious clients could send short messages which would result in a large memory allocation, potentially leading to denial of service. This issue affects Facebook Thrift prior to v2020.03.16.00.

criterions.comment: thrift package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
